title: preprocess_dataset  TypeError: __init__() takes at least 3 arguments (1 given)
body:
Hello, I want to use this software to get the clip-seq data motif, but it shows error like this.
###STEP 1: Filter raw bed-file
INPUT: .//bed/test/positive_raw.bed
OUTPUT: .//bed/test/positive.bed
STEP 1 finished (filtering resulted in 258 good binding sites)
###STEP 2: Elongate binding sites by 20 nt for structure prediction
INPUT: .//bed/test/positive.bed
OUTPUT: .//bed/test/positive_long.bed
STEP 2 finished
###STEP 3: Fetch nucleotide sequence for elongated binding sites
INPUT: .//bed/test/positive_long.bed
OUTPUT: .//temp/test/positive_long.fasta
STEP 3 finished
###STEP 4: Reformat nucleotide sequences into viewpoint format (binding sites in uppercase, elongation in lowercase)
INPUT: .//temp/test/positive_long.fasta
OUTPUT: .//fasta/test/positive.fasta
STEP 4 finished
###STEP 5: Calculate RNAshapes
INPUT: .//fasta/test/positive.fasta
OUTPUT: .//shapes/test/positive.txt
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/chendenghui/miniconda3/envs/sshmm_env/bin/preprocess_dataset", line 342, in <module>
    sys.exit(main(sys.argv))
  File "/home/chendenghui/miniconda3/envs/sshmm_env/bin/preprocess_dataset", line 283, in main
    calculate_rna_shapes_from_file(shapePositiveFileName, fastaPositiveFileName, 10)
  File "/home/chendenghui/miniconda3/envs/sshmm_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages/sshmm/structure_prediction.py", line 35, in calculate_rna_shapes_from_file
    contexts = translateIntoContexts(firstField)
  File "/home/chendenghui/miniconda3/envs/sshmm_env/lib/python2.7/site-packages/sshmm/structure_prediction.py", line 9, in translateIntoContexts
    bg = fgb.BulgeGraph()
TypeError: __init__() takes at least 3 arguments (1 given)

Could you give me some suggestions?
